languages.text: "В какую драматическую ситуацию завел тебя твой прелестный Путь, кузина. Не хотела молить о пощаде в Комморре? Теперь придется лизать ботинки мон-кай".
"Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "В какую драматическую ситуацию завел тебя твой прелестный Путь, кузина. Не хотела молить о пощаде в Комморре? Теперь придется лизать ботинки мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "What a dramatic situation your lovely Path has gotten you into. cousin. You didn't want to beg for mercy in Commorragh? Well, now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What a dramatic situation your lovely Path has gotten you into. cousin. You didn't want to beg for mercy in Commorragh? Well, now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “表妹啊，看来，你那美妙的道途将你引入了绝路。你在科摩罗时不肯求饶，现在你恐怕要舔猴子的臭脚了。”
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “表妹啊，看来，你那美妙的道途将你引入了绝路。你在科摩罗时不肯求饶，现在你恐怕要舔猴子的臭脚了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tu maravillosa senda te ha metido de lleno en una situación peliaguda, prima. Te negaste a rogar clemencia en Commorragh, y ahora vas a tener que lamer las botas de los mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Tu maravillosa senda te ha metido de lleno en una situación peliaguda, prima. Te negaste a rogar clemencia en Commorragh, y ahora vas a tener que lamer las botas de los mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Votre noble Voie vous a menée dans une situation pour le moins épineuse, cousine. Vous avez refusé de demander grâce à Commorragh, et vous voilà contrainte à lécher les bottes d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Votre noble Voie vous a menée dans une situation pour le moins épineuse, cousine. Vous avez refusé de demander grâce à Commorragh, et vous voilà contrainte à lécher les bottes d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Euer wunderbarer Pfad hat Euch in eine recht dornige Lage geführt, Base. In Commorragh habt Ihr Euch geweigert, um Gnade zu bitten, und jetzt müsst Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey die Stiefel lecken."
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Euer wunderbarer Pfad hat Euch in eine recht dornige Lage geführt, Base. In Commorragh habt Ihr Euch geweigert, um Gnade zu bitten, und jetzt müsst Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey die Stiefel lecken."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の素晴らしい道は、お前を茨の道へと導いたようだな、従兄弟よ。コモラフで慈悲を乞うことを拒んだくせに、今度はモン＝ケイにこびへつらわねばならないとは」
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の素晴らしい道は、お前を茨の道へと導いたようだな、従兄弟よ。コモラフで慈悲を乞うことを拒んだくせに、今度はモン＝ケイにこびへつらわねばならないとは」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Harika Yolun seni sıkıntılı bir duruma soktu soydaşım. Commorragh'ta merhamet dilenmeyi reddettin, şimdi mon-keighlere kul köle olmak zorunda kalacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Your wonderful Path has led you into a rather thorny situation, cousin. You refused to beg for mercy in Commorragh, and now you will have to lick the boots of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Harika Yolun seni sıkıntılı bir duruma soktu kuzen. Commorragh'ta merhamet dilenmeyi reddettin, şimdi mon-keighlere kul köle olmak zorunda kalacaksın."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
